text: Groundhog Day is a holiday on February 2. It is usually celebrated in North America. It marks about six weeks before the end of winter. It began in the year 1886. This holiday celebrates "Punxsutawney Phil", a groundhog who can supposedly forecast the weather. == Other websites == *Information about Groundhogs, Punxsutawney Phil and Ground Hog Day Category:Holidays of the United States Category:Holidays of Canada Category:February observances
title: Groundhog Day
